author: Taylor Locke
title: Bethenny Frankel: Declutter your home now to 'help be more productive when work life starts again'
description: "If you're not organizing every drawer, cabinet, garage, refrigerator etc. within an inch of its life, get started," Bethenny Frankel, founder of Skinnygirl and of disaster relief organization BStrong, tweeted on Thursday.
content:
While following "stay at home" orders across the country, reality star and entrepreneur Bethenny Frankel says taking the time to declutter and organize now will help with life after Covid-19.
"If you're not organizing every drawer, cabinet, garage, refrigera… [+1465 chars]
